front.title: Deprecation of MIB Module NAT-MIB (Managed Objects for Network Address Translators (NAT))

abstract.t: This memo deprecates MIB module NAT-MIB, a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) previously defined in RFC 4008 for devices implementing Network Address Translator (NAT) function. A companion document defines a new version, NAT-MIB-V2, which responds to deficiencies found in module NAT-MIB and adds new capabilities. This document obsoletes RFC 4008.
